description:
For exceptionally good viewing experience, the Sharp Aquos LC-42D62U is here for you. With a 1080p resolution, this Sharp 42'' LCD Television delivers very sharp pictures. The integrated ATSC / QAM / NTSC Tuner in this Sharp HDTV allows for a perfect reception of signals. The AQUOS liquid crystal in the Sharp Aquos LC-42D62U gives you high brightness and color for life like pictures. This Sharp 42'' LCD Television offers a high dynamic contrast ratio of 10,000:1 for quality viewing even if it is placed near windows and doors. With dual HDMI inputs in this Sharp HDTV, you can connect your blu-ray compatible players as well.
